page.title: 12ICKNIELD WALK SCHOOL FETE
page.content: Every Summer in June our school has a fete.There are stalls and games to play,and rides to have on our school field and playground.There was a {Sinclair C5}to ride in.It is battery powered and the handle bars are under your legs. There were other rides we could go on too,there was a {Chuffy Train}and a{tractor ride.}There was a game called {football accuracy} where I had to kick a ball through some tyres.The funniest game was the {Aunt Sally}where a teacher put his head though a hole in a picture and everyone paid to throw wet sponges at him.Every one liked throwing them at our headmaster.There was a{dog show and we brought our pets along.There was a{dancing display}around the maypole and a{fancy-dress}parade,and the theme was a person from 1066 to 1985.At the end was a {raffle draw.}
